src:
Fakta: Marcus Rashford Lebih Tajam dari Ronaldo pada Usia 22 Tahun
01 Nov 2019, 08:22 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Marcus Rashford merayakan ulang tahun ke-22 pada 31 Oktober 2019 kemarin. Pada usia ke-22, rupanya bomber Manchester United tersebut punya catatan gol yang lebih baik dari Cristiano Ronaldo.
Rashford memberi kado istimewa pada dirinya sendiri untuk perayaan ulang tahun ke-22. Kado tersebut didapat saat membawa Manchester United menang 2-1 atas Chelsea pada Carabao Cup di Stamford Bridge (30/10/2019).
Di laga tersebut, Rashford tampil sangat bagus. Pemain asal Inggris menjadi bintang kemenangan United. Rashford dua kali membobol gawang Chelsea. Satu gol dari tendangan penalti dan satu dari tendangan bebas.
Gol tendangan bebas Rashford juga mendapat banyak pujian. Rashford mencetak gol dari jarak jauh dengan sepakan kerasnya. Gol itu disejajarkan dengan gol tendangan bebas Cristiano Ronaldo ke gawang Portsmouth.
text:
Fact: Marcus Rashford is sharper than Ronaldo at the age of 22
Nov 01 2019, 08:22 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Marcus Rashford celebrated his 22nd birthday on 31 October 2019 yesterday. At the age of 22, apparently the Manchester United bomber had a better goal record than Cristiano Ronaldo.
Rashford gave a special gift to himself for the 22nd birthday celebration. The gift was obtained when bringing Manchester United's 2-1 win over Chelsea in the Carabao Cup at Stamford Bridge (10/30/2019).
In that match, Rashford appeared very good. Players from England became the star of United's victory. Rashford twice broke into the Chelsea goal. One goal from a penalty kick and one from a free kick.
Rashford's free-kick goal also won a lot of praise. Rashford scored from a distance with a hard kick. The goal was aligned with Cristiano Ronaldo's free kick goal against Portsmouth.
